Name: strcpy
Warning: Does not check for buffer overflows when copying to destination [MS-banned] (CWE-120).
Suggestion: Consider using snprintf, strcpy_s, or strlcpy (warning: strncpy easily misused).

Name: char
Warning: Statically-sized arrays can be improperly restricted, leading to potential overflows or other issues (CWE-119!/CWE-120).
